title: Power has been restored to much of Puerto Rico following an island-wide outage. Full restoration is possible Sunday, company says - CNN
content:
1. Power has been restored to much of Puerto Rico following an island-wide outage. Full restoration is possible Sunday, company says  CNN
  2. Power Returning to Puerto Rico, but Frustrations Remain  The New York Times
  3. Power in Puerto Rico restored to over 1 million after widespread blackout  Fox News
  4. Power still out for around 850000 customers in Puerto Rico amid massive outage  WPVI-TV
  5. Power restored to over 1 million after massive blackout in Puerto Rico  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Power could be fully restored in Puerto Rico by Sunday morning after hundreds of thousands of people on the island have been in the dark since a fire at a power plant Wednesday evening, officials said.
